short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on any link or image and convert it to QR code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on a text link or image link and convert generate QR code of that link. Scan the QR code through your phone and get the link on your phone. As simple as that. No need to open different apps or sending link through any messenger.
